sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaBrain, FaLightbulb, FaRocket, FaWrench, FaCheck, FaStar, FaQuoteLeft, FaChevronRight, FaRegLightbulb } from 'react-icons/fa'; import LoginButton from '../components/LoginButton'; const Home = () => { const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.auth); const [authError, setAuthError] = useState(false); const location = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { // Check for auth_error in URL query params const queryParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search); if (queryParams.get('auth_error') === 'true') { setAuthError(true); } }, [location]); const features = [ { icon: , title: 'AI-Powered Content', description: 'Generate high-quality content using Google Gemini API with just a few clicks.' }, { icon: , title: 'Multiple Content Types', description: 'Generate blog posts, articles, social media content, SEO copy, email templates, and more.' }, { icon: , title: 'Subscription Plans', description: 'Choose from different subscription plans that fit your needs and budget.' }, { icon: , title: 'Customizable', description: 'Customize your generated content with different tones, styles, and formats.' } ]; const pricingPlans = [ { name: 'Free', price: '0', features: [ '10 content generations per month', 'Basic content types', 'Maximum 500 words per generation', 'Standard response time' ], highlight: false, buttonText: 'Get Started' }, { name: 'Basic', price: '9.99', features: [ '50 content generations per month', 'All content types', 'Maximum 1,000 words per generation', 'Faster response time', 'Content history storage' ], highlight: true, buttonText: 'Subscribe Now' }, { name: 'Premium', price: '19.99', features: [ 'Unlimited content generations', 'All content types + premium templates', 'Maximum 2,000 words per generation', 'Priority response time', 'Content history with advanced search', 'Export to multiple formats' ], highlight: false, buttonText: 'Go Premium' } ]; const testimonials = [ { quote: "This AI content generator has completely transformed our content marketing strategy. We're producing 3x more content with half the effort.", author: "Sarah Johnson", role: "Marketing Director", company: "TechCraft Solutions" }, { quote: "As a freelance writer, this tool has helped me meet tight deadlines while maintaining quality. It's like having a writing assistant available 24/7.", author: "Michael Chen", role: "Content Creator", company: "Freelance Writer" }, { quote: "The subscription-based model means I only pay for what I need. The Basic plan gives me just enough generations for my small business blog.", author: "Emma Rodriguez", role: "Small Business Owner", company: "Crafty Creations" } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

AI-Powered Content Generator

Generate high-quality content in seconds with the power of AI. Perfect for bloggers, marketers, and content creators.

{authError && (
Authentication error. Please try signing in again or contact support if the issue persists.
)}
{user ? (
Create Content Manage Subscription
) : (
View Pricing
)}
{/* Hero Image */}
{/* How It Works Section */}

Simple Process

How It Works

Generate professional content in three simple steps

1

Choose Content Type

Select the type of content you want to generate - blog post, article, social media post, etc.

2

Enter Your Prompt

Describe what you want your content to be about with as much detail as needed.

3

Get AI-Generated Content

Review, edit, and use your professionally generated content in seconds!

{/* Features Section */}

Features

Powerful AI Tools

Everything you need to create amazing content with AI

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Pricing Section */}

Pricing

Choose Your Plan

Simple, transparent pricing to meet your content needs

{pricingPlans.map((plan, index) => (
{plan.highlight && (
Most Popular
)}

{plan.name}

${plan.price} /month

Everything you need to create professional AI-generated content

    {plan.features.map((feature, featureIndex) => (

  • {feature}

    • ))}
{user ? ( {plan.buttonText} ) : ( )}
))}
{/* Testimonials Section */}

Testimonials

What Our Users Say

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (

{testimonial.quote}

{testimonial.author.charAt(0)}

{testimonial.author}

{testimonial.role}, {testimonial.company}

))}
{/* FAQ Section */}

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

How does AI content generation work?

Our platform uses Google's Gemini AI to analyze your prompts and generate high-quality, contextually relevant content. The AI has been trained on vast amounts of text data to understand language patterns and produce human-like writing.

Is the generated content original?

Yes, all content generated is original. However, we recommend reviewing and editing the content to ensure it matches your brand voice and to verify any factual information before publishing.

Can I upgrade or downgrade my subscription?

Yes, you can change your subscription plan at any time. Changes will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

Is there a limit to how much content I can generate?

Free accounts are limited to 10 generations per month. Basic accounts get 50 generations, and Premium accounts have unlimited generations. Each generation has a word limit depending on your plan.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to create amazing content? Start generating today.

Join thousands of content creators, marketers, and businesses who trust our AI content generation platform.

{user ? ( Generate Content ) : ( )}
); }; export default Home;
